title: Sona Sona Sona Lyrics Vasuvum Saravananum Onna Padichavanga
stanzas: <div>Sona Sona Sona Lyrics Vasuvum Saravananum Onna Padichavanga

na na na na
break it down like this

vaadi en pakkam konjam vaadi
vaadi adi vekkam vittu vaadi
vaadi vandhu
love ah solli podi ..vaadi

vaadi naan unaketha jodi
vaadi un jaadiketha moodi
vaadi vandhu
mutham onnu thaadi vaadi

sona sona sona
nee en garden-ah
thotti chedi pole
poothaai modern ah

sona sona sona
nee en violin-ah
nenjil indru keten
kadhal dheemthanaa

kadhal konda pen manam
adhu express train ah
waiting list il vaikirai
ennai confirm seivadhu eppodhu

vaadi en pakkam konjam vaadi
vaadi adi vekkam vittu vaadi
vaadi vandhu
love ah solli podi ..vaadi

when you come around
you make me lose my mind
lose my mind girl.
when you come and talk them losing
track of time..
i am losing time girl.

you walk into my life and you
change it girl yo.
one of the kind and
you know it girl yo
you are the girl
my dream girl
you are love of this
life of mine.

single tea-a pola romba
local aana aalu naan
coffee day ah thedi rendu
kaalu pogudhe
mapsal theatre poi kaththi
koochal podum aalu naan
multiplex-u poga
ippo moodu vandhadhu

cellphone-u ringtone
andru dandanakka
adhu unnala maari pochu
carnatic ah
adi innum enna solla
mounam enna kolla

vaadi en pakkam konjam vaadi
vaadi adi vekkam vittu vaadi
vaadi vandhu love ah
solli podi vaadi

vaadi naan unaketha jodi
vaadi un jaadiketha moodi
vaadi vandhu
mutham onnu thaadi vaadi

pechu moochu ninnu pochu
enna konjam paaradi
oxygen ah pola vandhu
kadhal solladi
watch-u mulla pola unna
suthum endhan kaaladi

tab-u screen ah pola enna
touch-u pannadi
egmore-u museum pol
en kaadhal dhaan
adhu solladho
unnapathi varalaru thaan

adi munna pola illa
kadhal enna kolla vaadi

poda nee mokka poda vena
poda enna follow panna venaam
poda over film-u
kaatta venaam podaa

poda enna look-u vida venaam
poda un love-u ellam venaam
poda nee pothikittu
poda podaa

sona sona sona
nee en garden-ah
thotti chedi pole
poothaai modern ah
sona sona sona
